title: MOTHER'S DAY GIFT BOX
description: Show the mothers in your life just how much you care with this Limited Edition Mother's Day Gift Box.  From relaxation to indulgence, this box has something for every mood.  The best part? We've done the work for you and packaged it all together in a ready-to-gift box, valued well over $100.
includes: One Box of Four SINGH 5'Star Macarons: Two Masala Chai and Two Mango Lassi
One SINGH 5'Star Home Candle: Attar No. 36
One Box of SINGH 5'Star Home Matches
Two VAHDAM India Loose Leaf Tea Tins: One Masala Chai and One Turmeric Spiced Blend
One SINGH 5'Star Home G & Tea Straw
description1: - Attar No. 36 Fragrance Notes: nutmeg, clove, apple, lily of the valley, iris, cedarwood, sandalwood, patchouli and amber
description2: - Each tea tin contains 1.76 oz of loose leaf tea and yields up to 25 cups
description4: Orders must be attached to a reservation or picked up at SINGH 5'Star (36 E 20th St.) during opening hours between May 11 and May 14th. When ordering, please provide the name, date and time of your reservation, or the date and time you wish to pickup in the 'Notes for Restaurant' field at checkout. Orders submitted here will NOT be shipped.
